import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; const Movie = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [movie, setMovie] = React.useState(""); React.useEffect(() => { axios .get(`/api/movies/${id}`) .then((re) => re.data) .then((data) => setMovie(data)); }, ""); const handlerClick = () => { axios.put("/api/favorites", { imdbID: id, }); }; console.log(movie); return ( <>
